analysis.key_quote: Schedule F proposal to make government professionals currently hired based on merit into political appointees who can be fired ‘at will' - this will affect the quality of people we attract to work in the government as well as the quality of work provided by people who do get hired.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the Schedule F proposal by highlighting concerns about merit-based hiring, the potential for politicization, and the negative impact on institutional knowledge and workforce stability.
